bank.definition: Bank products category including EDL (Enterprise Development Loan), Cash Credit, OD/TD (Overdraft against Term Deposit), and term loans
bank.business_meaning: Traditional banking products offered through branches
bank.region_logic: Region is 'OS' if branch_code is 333, otherwise 'NE' for EDL products. For other products, region is always 'NE'

digital.definition: Digital loan products including Credin and other digital lending products (excluding Credit Card and No Cost EMI)

credit_card.definition: Credit card products including credit_card and no_cost_emi order types

khatabook.definition: Khatabook loan products - a specific digital lending product

da.definition: DA (Deferred Annuity) products - loans with deferred annuity structure
da.business_meaning: Loans structured with deferred annuity payments

region.definition: Geographic region classification - OS (Overseas) or NE (North East)
region.business_meaning: Regional classification based on branch code or product type

product_group.business_meaning: High-level grouping of products for analysis

bank.EDL: Products like edl_migrated, edl_inventory, edl_property, edl rs. 5 lacs and above, edl_migrated_greater_than_5_lacs, 7606/7607/7608 - enterprise development loan (buss)

current_pos.definition: Current Position - total outstanding amount for reporting
current_pos.business_meaning: Total outstanding balance for a product group and region

da_adjustment.definition: Deferred Annuity adjustment factor applied to outstanding amounts
da_adjustment.business_meaning: Adjustment factor based on DA date: 0.01 for Feb 2024, 0.05 for other months, 1.0 if no DA date
da_adjustment.computation: If DA date month = Feb 2024 then 0.01, else if DA date is null then 1.0, else 0.05

writeoff.definition: Loans that have been written off and should be excluded from reporting
writeoff.business_meaning: Loans that are no longer active and should not be included in outstanding calculations
writeoff.exclusion_rule: Exclude orders present in writeoff_users or provisional_writeoff tables

unsettled.definition: Loans that have not been settled
unsettled.business_meaning: Loans that are still active and require tracking

nbfc_filter.definition: Filter for specific NBFCs: quadrillion, slicenesfb, nesfb
nbfc_filter.business_meaning: Filter to include only loans from specific NBFC partners

reportdate.definition: Report date - the date for which the data snapshot is taken
reportdate.business_meaning: The date for which the outstanding balances are reported

branch_code_333.definition: Branch code 333 indicates OS (Overseas) region for EDL products
branch_code_333.business_meaning: Branch code 333 is used to identify OS region for EDL products

edl_products.definition: EDL (Enterprise Development Loan) products - a category of bank products

arc_flag.definition: ARC flag - indicates if loan is in ARC (Asset Reconstruction Company) status
arc_flag.business_meaning: Flag to exclude ARC cases from reporting
arc_flag.exclusion_rule: Include only if arc_flag IS NULL OR arc_flag = 'N' OR arc_flag = 'NULL'

originator.definition: Originator - the platform or channel that originated the loan
originator.business_meaning: The original source of the loan
